TCName.name: SalesHistoryFirstMonth
TCName.SalesHistory: select T.wk_id,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPS from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month') order by wk_id) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select S.perd_desc,S.wk_id,S.ACTL_SALES from (select b.perd_desc,b.wk_id, ROUND(sum(a.actl_sls),0) as ACTL_SALES from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and loc_no in ('store') and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by b.wk_id) S) U on T.wk_id=U.wk_id order by T.wk_id
TCName.SalesHistoryTotal: select J.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(J.ACTL_SLS_MPS),0) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPS from (select T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPS from (select loc_nm from loc where loc_no='store') T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select S.loc_nm,S.perd_desc,S.wk_id,S.ACTL_SALES from (select lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id, ROUND(sum(a.actl_sls),0) as ACTL_SALES from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b,loc lc where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and a.loc_no=lc.loc_no group by lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by b.wk_id) S) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.loc_nm) J group by J.loc_nm

TCName.name: WagesHistoryFirsthMonth
TCName.WagesHistory: select T.wk_id,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPS from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month') order by wk_id) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.wk_id,ROUND(sum(ACTL_WAGE),0) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no, a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.wk_id order by c.wk_id) U on T.wk_id=U.wk_id order by T.wk_id
TCName.WagesHistoryTotal: select T.loc_nm,ROUND(NVL(sum(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR),0),0) as ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPS from (select loc_nm from loc where loc_no='store') T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.loc_nm,c.wk_id,sum(ACTL_WAGE) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by c.loc_nm,C.wk_id order by c.loc_nm,c.wk_id) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm group by T.loc_nm

TCName.PaidHoursHistory: select T.wk_id,NVL(ROUND(((ROUND(((U.ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR*100)/25),0)*25)/100),2),0) as ACTL_HRS_MPS from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month') order by wk_id) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.wk_id,ROUND(sum(ACTL_WAGE),0) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no, a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.wk_id order by c.wk_id) U on T.wk_id=U.wk_id order by T.wk_id

TCName.name: ItemPriceHistoryFirsthMonth
TCName.ItemPriceHistory: select T.wk_id,NVL(ACTL_ITEM_PRICE,0) as ACTL_ITEM_PRICE_MPS from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month') order by wk_id) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.perd_desc,C.wk_id, case when NVL(C.ACTL_SALES,0)=0 and NVL(C.ACTL_ITEMS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(C.ACTL_SALES,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(C.ACTL_ITEMS,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((C.ACTL_SALES / C.ACTL_ITEMS),2) end as ACTL_ITEM_PRICE from (select b.perd_desc,b.wk_id, ROUND(sum(a.actl_sls),0) as ACTL_SALES, sum(a.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITEMS from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and loc_no = 'store' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by b.wk_id) C order by c.wk_id) U on T.wk_id=U.wk_id order by T.wk_id
TCName.ItemPriceHistoryTotal: select actl_sls_itm.loc_nm, case when NVL(actl_sls_itm.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPS,0)=0 and NVL(actl_sls_itm.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_sls_itm.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_sls_itm.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPS,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND(actl_sls_itm.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPS / actl_sls_itm.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPS,2) end as ACTL_ITM_PRICE_TOT_MPS from (select J.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(J.ACTL_SLS_MPS),0) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPS,ROUND(sum(J.ACTL_ITM_MPS),0) as ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPS from (select T.loc_nm, NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPS,NVL(U.ACTL_ITEMS,0) as ACTL_ITM_MPS from (select loc_nm from loc where loc_no='store') T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select S.loc_nm,S.perd_desc,S.wk_id,S.ACTL_SALES,S.ACTL_ITEMS from (select lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id, ROUND(sum(a.actl_sls),0) as ACTL_SALES,ROUND(sum(a.actl_itm_cnt),0) as ACTL_ITEMS from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b, loc lc where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and a.loc_no=lc.loc_no group by lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by b.wk_id) S) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.loc_nm) J group by J.loc_nm) actl_sls_itm

TCName.name: ItemPriceHistorySecondMonth
TCName.ItemPriceHistory: select T.wk_id,NVL(ACTL_ITEM_PRICE,0) as ACTL_ITEM_PRICE_MPS from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month') order by wk_id) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.perd_desc,C.wk_id, case when NVL(C.ACTL_SALES,0)=0 and NVL(C.ACTL_ITEMS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(C.ACTL_SALES,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(C.ACTL_ITEMS,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((C.ACTL_SALES / C.ACTL_ITEMS),2) end as ACTL_ITEM_PRICE from (select b.perd_desc,b.wk_id, ROUND(sum(a.actl_sls),0) as ACTL_SALES, sum(a.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITEMS from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and loc_no = 'store' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by b.wk_id) C order by c.wk_id) U on T.wk_id=U.wk_id order by T.wk_id
TCName.ItemPriceHistoryTotal: select actl_sls_itm.loc_nm, case when NVL(actl_sls_itm.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPS,0)=0 and NVL(actl_sls_itm.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_sls_itm.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_sls_itm.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPS,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND(actl_sls_itm.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPS / actl_sls_itm.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPS,2) end as ACTL_ITM_PRICE_TOT_MPS from (select J.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(J.ACTL_SLS_MPS),0) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPS,ROUND(sum(J.ACTL_ITM_MPS),0) as ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPS from (select T.loc_nm, NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPS,NVL(U.ACTL_ITEMS,0) as ACTL_ITM_MPS from (select loc_nm from loc where loc_no='store') T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select S.loc_nm,S.perd_desc,S.wk_id,S.ACTL_SALES,S.ACTL_ITEMS from (select lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id, ROUND(sum(a.actl_sls),0) as ACTL_SALES,ROUND(sum(a.actl_itm_cnt),0) as ACTL_ITEMS from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b, loc lc where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and a.loc_no=lc.loc_no group by lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by b.wk_id) S) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.loc_nm) J group by J.loc_nm) actl_sls_itm

TCName.name: ItemPriceHistoryFourthMonth
TCName.ItemPriceHistory: select T.wk_id,NVL(ACTL_ITEM_PRICE,0) as ACTL_ITEM_PRICE_MPS from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month') order by wk_id) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.perd_desc,C.wk_id, case when NVL(C.ACTL_SALES,0)=0 and NVL(C.ACTL_ITEMS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(C.ACTL_SALES,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(C.ACTL_ITEMS,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((C.ACTL_SALES / C.ACTL_ITEMS),2) end as ACTL_ITEM_PRICE from (select b.perd_desc,b.wk_id, ROUND(sum(a.actl_sls),0) as ACTL_SALES, sum(a.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITEMS from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and loc_no = 'store' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by b.wk_id) C order by c.wk_id) U on T.wk_id=U.wk_id order by T.wk_id

TCName.name: WagePercentageHistoryFirsthMonth
TCName.WagePercentageHistory: select actl_wge.wk_id, case when NVL(actl_wge.ACTL_WAGE_MPS,0)=0 and NVL(actl_sls.ACTL_SLS_MPS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_wge.ACTL_WAGE_MPS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_sls.ACTL_SLS_MPS,0)=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND(((actl_wge.ACTL_WAGE_MPS / actl_sls.ACTL_SLS_MPS)*100),2),0) end as ACTL_WAGE_PRCNT_MPS from (select T.wk_id,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPS from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month') order by wk_id) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.wk_id,ROUND(sum(ACTL_WAGE),0) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR, sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no, b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.wk_id order by c.wk_id) U on T.wk_id=U.wk_id order by T.wk_id) actl_wge, (select T.wk_id,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPS from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month') order by wk_id) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select S.perd_desc,S.wk_id,S.ACTL_SALES from (select b.perd_desc,b.wk_id, ROUND(sum(a.actl_sls),0) as ACTL_SALES from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and loc_no in ('store') and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by b.wk_id) S) U on T.wk_id=U.wk_id order by T.wk_id) actl_sls where actl_wge.wk_id=actl_sls.wk_id order by actl_wge.wk_id
TCName.WagePercentageHistoryTotal: select actl_wge.loc_nm, case when NVL(actl_wge.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPS,0)=0 and NVL(actl_sls.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_wge.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_sls.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPS,0)=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND(((actl_wge.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPS / actl_sls.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPS)*100),2),0) end as ACTL_WAGE_PRCNT_TOT_MPS from (select T.loc_nm,ROUND(NVL(sum(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR),0),0) as ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPS from (select loc_nm from loc where loc_no='store') T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.loc_nm,c.wk_id,sum(ACTL_WAGE) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by c.loc_nm,C.wk_id order by c.loc_nm,c.wk_id) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm group by T.loc_nm) actl_wge,(select J.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(J.ACTL_SLS_MPS),0) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPS from (select T.loc_nm, NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPS from (select loc_nm from loc where loc_no='store') T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select S.loc_nm,S.perd_desc,S.wk_id,S.ACTL_SALES from (select lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id, ROUND(sum(a.actl_sls),0) as ACTL_SALES from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b,loc lc where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and a.loc_no=lc.loc_no group by lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by b.wk_id) S) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.loc_nm) J group by J.loc_nm) actl_sls where actl_wge.loc_nm=actl_sls.loc_nm

TCName.WagePercentageHistoryTotal: select actl_wge.loc_nm, case when NVL(actl_wge.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPS,0)=0 and NVL(actl_sls.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_wge.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_sls.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPS,0)=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND(((actl_wge.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPS / actl_sls.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPS)*100),2),0) end as ACTL_WAGE_PRCNT_TOT_MPS from (select T.loc_nm,ROUND(NVL(sum(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR),0),0) as ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPS from (select loc_nm from loc where loc_no='store') T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.loc_nm,c.wk_id,sum(ACTL_WAGE) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by c.loc_nm,C.wk_id order by c.loc_nm,c.wk_id) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm group by T.loc_nm) actl_wge,(select J.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(J.ACTL_SLS_MPS),0) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPS from (select T.loc_nm, NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPS from (select loc_nm from loc where loc_no='store') T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select S.loc_nm,S.perd_desc,S.wk_id,S.ACTL_SALES from (select lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id, ROUND(sum(a.actl_sls),0) as ACTL_SALES from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b,loc lc where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and a.loc_no=lc.loc_no group by lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by b.wk_id) S) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.loc_nm) J group by J.loc_nm) actl_sls where actl_wge.loc_nm=actl_sls.loc_nm

TCName.name: WagePercentageHistoryThirdMonth
TCName.WagePercentageHistory: select actl_wge.wk_id, case when NVL(actl_wge.ACTL_WAGE_MPS,0)=0 and NVL(actl_sls.ACTL_SLS_MPS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_wge.ACTL_WAGE_MPS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_sls.ACTL_SLS_MPS,0)=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND(((actl_wge.ACTL_WAGE_MPS / actl_sls.ACTL_SLS_MPS)*100),2),0) end as ACTL_WAGE_PRCNT_MPS from (select T.wk_id,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPS from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month') order by wk_id) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.wk_id,ROUND(sum(ACTL_WAGE),0) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR, sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no, b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.wk_id order by c.wk_id) U on T.wk_id=U.wk_id order by T.wk_id) actl_wge, (select T.wk_id,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPS from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month') order by wk_id) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select S.perd_desc,S.wk_id,S.ACTL_SALES from (select b.perd_desc,b.wk_id, ROUND(sum(a.actl_sls),0) as ACTL_SALES from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and loc_no in ('store') and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by b.wk_id) S) U on T.wk_id=U.wk_id order by T.wk_id) actl_sls where actl_wge.wk_id=actl_sls.wk_id order by actl_wge.wk_id

TCName.name: CPHFirsthMonth
TCName.CPHHistory: select T.wk_id, NVL(ACTL_CPH_MPS,0) as ACTL_CPH_MPS from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month') order by wk_id) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.wk_id, case when NVL(sum(ACTL_WAGE),0)=0 and NVL(sum(ACTL_HRS),0)=0 then 0 when NVL(sum(ACTL_WAGE),0)=0 then 0 when NVL(sum(ACTL_HRS),0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((ROUND(sum(ACTL_WAGE),0) / ROUND(sum(ACTL_HRS),2)),2) end as ACTL_CPH_MPS from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no, d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 and a.div_no='Division' group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no, a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.wk_id order by c.wk_id) U on T.wk_id=U.wk_id order by T.wk_id
TCName.CPHHistoryTotal: select actl_wge_hrs.loc_nm, case when NVL(actl_wge_hrs.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPS,0)=0 and NVL(actl_wge_hrs.ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_wge_hrs.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_wge_hrs.ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPS,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND(actl_wge_hrs.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPS / actl_wge_hrs.ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPS,2) end as ACTL_CPH_TOT_MPS from (select T.loc_nm,ROUND(NVL(sum(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR),0),0) as ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPS,ROUND(NVL(sum(U.ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR),0),0) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPS from (select loc_nm from loc where loc_no='store') T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.loc_nm,c.wk_id,sum(ACTL_WAGE) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 and a.div_no='Division' group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by c.loc_nm,C.wk_id order by c.loc_nm,c.wk_id) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm group by T.loc_nm) actl_wge_hrs

TCName.name: CPHHistoryThirdMonth
TCName.CPHHistory: select T.wk_id, NVL(ACTL_CPH_MPS,0) as ACTL_CPH_MPS from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month') order by wk_id) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.wk_id, case when NVL(sum(ACTL_WAGE),0)=0 and NVL(sum(ACTL_HRS),0)=0 then 0 when NVL(sum(ACTL_WAGE),0)=0 then 0 when NVL(sum(ACTL_HRS),0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((ROUND(sum(ACTL_WAGE),0) / ROUND(sum(ACTL_HRS),2)),2) end as ACTL_CPH_MPS from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no, d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 and a.div_no='Division' group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no, a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.wk_id order by c.wk_id) U on T.wk_id=U.wk_id order by T.wk_id
TCName.CPHHistoryTotal: select actl_wge_hrs.loc_nm, case when NVL(actl_wge_hrs.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPS,0)=0 and NVL(actl_wge_hrs.ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_wge_hrs.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_wge_hrs.ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPS,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND(actl_wge_hrs.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPS / actl_wge_hrs.ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPS,2) end as ACTL_CPH_TOT_MPS from (select T.loc_nm,ROUND(NVL(sum(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR),0),0) as ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPS,ROUND(NVL(sum(U.ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR),0),0) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPS from (select loc_nm from loc where loc_no='store') T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.loc_nm,c.wk_id,sum(ACTL_WAGE) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 and a.div_no='Division' group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by c.loc_nm,C.wk_id order by c.loc_nm,c.wk_id) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm group by T.loc_nm) actl_wge_hrs

TCName.name: CPHHistoryFourthMonth
TCName.CPHHistory: select T.wk_id, NVL(ACTL_CPH_MPS,0) as ACTL_CPH_MPS from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month') order by wk_id) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.wk_id, case when NVL(sum(ACTL_WAGE),0)=0 and NVL(sum(ACTL_HRS),0)=0 then 0 when NVL(sum(ACTL_WAGE),0)=0 then 0 when NVL(sum(ACTL_HRS),0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((ROUND(sum(ACTL_WAGE),0) / ROUND(sum(ACTL_HRS),2)),2) end as ACTL_CPH_MPS from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no, d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 and a.div_no='Division' group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no, a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.wk_id order by c.wk_id) U on T.wk_id=U.wk_id order by T.wk_id
TCName.CPHHistoryTotal: select actl_wge_hrs.loc_nm, case when NVL(actl_wge_hrs.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPS,0)=0 and NVL(actl_wge_hrs.ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_wge_hrs.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_wge_hrs.ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPS,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND(actl_wge_hrs.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPS / actl_wge_hrs.ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPS,2) end as ACTL_CPH_TOT_MPS from (select T.loc_nm,ROUND(NVL(sum(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR),0),0) as ACTL_WAGE_TOT_MPS,ROUND(NVL(sum(U.ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR),0),0) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPS from (select loc_nm from loc where loc_no='store') T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.loc_nm,c.wk_id,sum(ACTL_WAGE) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 and a.div_no='Division' group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by c.loc_nm,C.wk_id order by c.loc_nm,c.wk_id) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm group by T.loc_nm) actl_wge_hrs

TCName.name: BudgetSales_CurrentMonth
TCName.BudgetSales: select f.wk_id,NVL(g.BDGT_SALES_MNTH_STR,0) as BDGT_SLS_MNTH_STR from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.loc_no,C.perd_desc,c.wk_id,ROUND(sum(BDGT_SALES),0) as BDGT_SALES_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,ROUND(sum(bdgt_sls),0) as BDGT_SALES, sum(bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and a.div_no='Division' group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc, a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by c.loc_no,c.perd_desc,C.wk_id order by c.loc_no,c.wk_id) g on f.perd_desc=g.perd_desc and f.wk_id=g.wk_id order by f.wk_id
TCName.BudgetSalesTotal: select C.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(BDGT_SLS_MPS),0) as BDGT_SLS_TOT_MPS from (select f.loc_nm,NVL(g.BDGT_SALES_MPS,0) as BDGT_SLS_MPS from (select loc_nm from loc where loc_no='store') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,C.perd_desc,c.wk_id,ROUND(sum(BDGT_SALES),0) as BDGT_SALES_MPS from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,ROUND(sum(bdgt_sls),0) as BDGT_SALES, sum(bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and a.div_no='Division' group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc, a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,c.perd_desc,C.wk_id order by c.loc_no,c.wk_id) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm order by f.loc_nm) C group by c.loc_nm
TCName.ForecastSales: select f.wk_id,NVL(g.FCST_SALES_MPS,0) as FCST_SLS_MPS from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.loc_no,C.perd_desc,c.wk_id,ROUND(sum(FRCST_SLS),0) as FCST_SALES_MPS from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no, d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,ROUND(sum(FRCST_SLS),0) as FRCST_SLS, sum(FRCST_WAGE_AMT) as FCST_WAGE from WW_WLP.MNTH_FCST a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and a.div_no='Division' group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by c.loc_no,c.perd_desc,C.wk_id order by c.loc_no,c.wk_id) g on f.perd_desc=g.perd_desc and f.wk_id=g.wk_id order by f.wk_id
TCName.ForecastSalesTotal: select C.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(FCST_SLS_MPS),0) as FCST_SLS_TOT_MPS from (select f.loc_nm,NVL(g.FCST_SALES_MPS,0) as FCST_SLS_MPS from (select loc_nm from loc where loc_no='store') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,C.perd_desc,c.wk_id,ROUND(sum(FCST_SALES),0) as FCST_SALES_MPS from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,ROUND(sum(frcst_sls),0) as FCST_SALES, sum(frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WAGE from WW_WLP.mnth_fcst a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and a.div_no='Division' group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc, a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,c.perd_desc,C.wk_id order by c.loc_no,c.wk_id) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm order by f.loc_nm) C group by c.loc_nm

TCName.name: GeneratedSales_CurrentMonth
TCName.GeneratedSales: select f.wk_id,NVL(g.GEN_SALES_MNTH_STR,0) as GEN_SLS_MNTH_STR from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select a.loc_no,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id,ROUND(sum(a.gnrt_sls),0) as GEN_SALES_MNTH_STR from WW_WLP.fcst a,WW_WLP.WK b where a.fcst_dte between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and loc_no = 'store' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.loc_no,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) g on f.perd_desc=g.perd_desc and f.wk_id=g.wk_id order by f.wk_id
TCName.GeneratedSalesTotal: select h.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(h.GEN_SLS_MPS),0) as GEN_SLS_TOT_MPS from (select f.loc_nm,NVL(g.GEN_SALES_MNTH_STR,0) as GEN_SLS_MPS from (select loc_nm from loc where loc_no='store') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select a.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id,ROUND(sum(a.gnrt_sls),0) as GEN_SALES_MNTH_STR from WW_WLP.fcst a,WW_WLP.WK b,ww_wlp.loc lc where a.fcst_dte between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and a.loc_no = 'store' and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and a.loc_no=lc.loc_no group by a.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.wk_id) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm order by f.loc_nm ) h group by h.loc_nm

TCName.name: PlannedSales_CurrentMonth
TCName.PlannedSales: select f.wk_id,NVL(e.PLAN_SALES,0) as PLN_SLS_MNTH_STR from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select a.loc_no,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,round(sum(a.mgr_wky_sls),0) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,wk b where a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no='store' and a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id group by a.loc_no,b.perd_desc, a.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id) c UNION select * from (select loc_no,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id,Round(sum(gnrt_sls),0) as GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.fcst a,wk b where div_no='Division' and loc_no='store' and dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc='Month' and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select loc_no,wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln where div_no='Division' and loc_no='store' and wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month')) group by loc_no,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by loc_no,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id) d) e on f.perd_desc=e.perd_desc and f.wk_id=e.wk_id order by f.wk_id
TCName.PlannedSalesTotal: select g.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(g.PLN_SLS_MNTH_STR),0) as PLN_SLS_MNTH_STR_TOT from (select f.loc_nm,NVL(e.PLAN_SALES,0) as PLN_SLS_MNTH_STR from (select loc_nm from loc where loc_no='store') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select a.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,round(sum(a.mgr_wky_sls),0) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,wk b,loc lc where a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no='store' and a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id group by a.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id) c UNION select * from (select a.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id,Round(sum(gnrt_sls),0) as GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.fcst a,wk b,loc lc where a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no='store' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and a.fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc='Month' and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select loc_no,wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln where div_no='Division' and loc_no='store' and wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc= 'Month')) and a.loc_no=lc.loc_no group by a.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id) d) e on f.loc_nm=e.loc_nm order by f.loc_nm) g group by g.loc_nm

TCName.name: VarToBUDSales_CurrentMonth
TCName.VartoBUD: select R.wk_id,NVL((R.PLN_SLS_MNTH_STR - S.BDGT_SALES_MNTH_STR),0) as VAR_TO_BDGT_SLS_MNTH_STR from (select f.perd_desc,f.wk_id,NVL(e.PLAN_SALES,0) as PLN_SLS_MNTH_STR from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select a.loc_no,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id, round(sum(a.mgr_wky_sls),0) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,wk b where a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no='store' and a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id group by a.loc_no,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id) c UNION select * from (select loc_no,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id,Round(sum(gnrt_sls),0) as GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.fcst a,wk b where div_no='Division' and loc_no='store' and dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc='Month' and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select loc_no,wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln where div_no='Division' and loc_no='store' and wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month')) group by loc_no,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by loc_no,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id) d) e on f.perd_desc=e.perd_desc and f.wk_id=e.wk_id order by f.wk_id) R,(select f.wk_id,NVL(g.BDGT_SALES_MNTH_STR,0) as BDGT_SALES_MNTH_STR from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.loc_no,C.perd_desc,c.wk_id,ROUND(sum(BDGT_SALES),0) as BDGT_SALES_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,ROUND(sum(bdgt_sls),0) as BDGT_SALES, sum(bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc, a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by c.loc_no,c.perd_desc,C.wk_id order by c.loc_no,c.wk_id) g on f.perd_desc=g.perd_desc and f.wk_id=g.wk_id order by f.wk_id) S where R.wk_id=S.wk_id order by R.wk_id
TCName.VartoBUDTotal: select R.loc_nm,NVL((R.PLN_SLS_MNTH_STR_TOT - S.BDGT_SLS_TOT_MPS),0) as VAR_TO_BDGT_SLS_TOT_MPS from (select g.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(g.PLN_SLS_MNTH_STR),0) as PLN_SLS_MNTH_STR_TOT from (select f.loc_nm,NVL(e.PLAN_SALES,0) as PLN_SLS_MNTH_STR from (select loc_nm from loc where loc_no='store') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select a.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,round(sum(a.mgr_wky_sls),0) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,wk b, loc lc where a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no='store' and a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id group by a.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id) c UNION select * from (select a.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id,Round(sum(gnrt_sls),0) as GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.fcst a,wk b,loc lc where a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no='store' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and a.fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc='Month' and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select loc_no,wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln where div_no='Division' and loc_no='store' and wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month')) and a.loc_no=lc.loc_no group by a.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id) d) e on f.loc_nm=e.loc_nm order by f.loc_nm) g group by g.loc_nm) R,(select C.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(BDGT_SLS_MPS),0) as BDGT_SLS_TOT_MPS from (select f.loc_nm,NVL(g.BDGT_SALES_MPS,0) as BDGT_SLS_MPS from (select loc_nm from loc where loc_no='store') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,C.perd_desc,c.wk_id,ROUND(sum(BDGT_SALES),0) as BDGT_SALES_MPS from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,ROUND(sum(bdgt_sls),0) as BDGT_SALES, sum(bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,c.perd_desc,C.wk_id order by c.loc_no, c.wk_id) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm order by f.loc_nm) C group by c.loc_nm) S where R.loc_nm=S.loc_nm
TCName.VartoFCST: select R.wk_id,NVL((R.PLN_SLS_MNTH_STR - S.FCST_SLS_MNTH_STR),0) as VAR_TO_FCST_SLS_MPS from (select f.perd_desc,f.wk_id,NVL(e.PLAN_SALES,0) as PLN_SLS_MNTH_STR from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select a.loc_no,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id, round(sum(a.mgr_wky_sls),0) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,wk b where a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no='store' and a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id group by a.loc_no,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id) c UNION select * from (select loc_no,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id,Round(sum(gnrt_sls),0) as GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.fcst a,wk b where div_no='Division' and loc_no='store' and dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc='Month' and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select loc_no,wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln where div_no='Division' and loc_no='store' and wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month')) group by loc_no,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by loc_no,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id) d) e on f.perd_desc=e.perd_desc and f.wk_id=e.wk_id order by f.wk_id) R,(select f.wk_id,NVL(g.FCST_SALES_MPS,0) as FCST_SLS_MNTH_STR from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.loc_no,C.perd_desc,c.wk_id,ROUND(sum(FRCST_SLS),0) as FCST_SALES_MPS from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no, d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,ROUND(sum(FRCST_SLS),0) as FRCST_SLS, sum(FRCST_WAGE_AMT) as FCST_WAGE from WW_WLP.MNTH_FCST a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by c.loc_no,c.perd_desc,C.wk_id order by c.loc_no,c.wk_id) g on f.perd_desc=g.perd_desc and f.wk_id=g.wk_id order by f.wk_id) S where R.wk_id=S.wk_id order by R.wk_id

a.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id,Round(sum(gnrt_sls),0) as GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.fcst a,wk b,loc lc where a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no='store' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and a.fcst_dte f.loc_nm) g group by g.loc_nm) R,(select C.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(FCST_SLS_MPS),0) as FCST_SLS_TOT_MPS from (select f.loc_nm,NVL(g.FCST_SALES_MPS,0) as FCST_SLS_MPS from (select loc_nm from loc where loc_no='store') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,C.perd_desc,c.wk_id,ROUND(sum(FCST_SALES),0) as FCST_SALES_MPS from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,ROUND(sum(frcst_sls),0) as FCST_SALES, sum(frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WAGE from WW_WLP.mnth_fcst a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by TCName.name: LYPercentageSales_CurrentMonth
TCName.LYPercentageSales: select T.wk_id, case when NVL(T.PLN_SLS_MNTH_STR,0)=0 and NVL(U.ACTL_SALES_LY,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(T.PLN_SLS_MNTH_STR,0)=0 then -100 when NVL(U.ACTL_SALES_LY,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND(((T.PLN_SLS_MNTH_STR / U.ACTL_SALES_LY)-1)*100,2) end as LY_SLS_PRCNT from (select rownum x,f.perd_desc,f.wk_id,NVL(e.PLAN_SALES,0) as PLN_SLS_MNTH_STR from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select a.loc_no,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id, round(sum(a.mgr_wky_sls),0) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,wk b where a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no='store' and a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id group by a.loc_no,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id) c UNION select * from (select loc_no,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id,Round(sum(gnrt_sls),0) as GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.fcst a,wk b where div_no='Division' and loc_no='store' and dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc='Month' and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select loc_no,wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln where div_no='Division' and loc_no='store' and wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month')) group by loc_no,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by loc_no,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id) d) e on f.perd_desc=e.perd_desc and f.wk_id=e.wk_id order by f.wk_id) T INNER JOIN (select Rownum x,S.perd_desc,S.wk_id,S.ACTL_SALES_LY from (select b.perd_desc,b.wk_id, ROUND(sum(a.actl_sls),0) as ACTL_SALES_LY from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('LYMnth') and loc_no in ('store') and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by b.wk_id) S) U on T.x=U.x order by T.wk_id
TCName.LYPercentageSalesTotal: select T.loc_nm, case when NVL(T.PLN_SLS_MNTH_STR_TOT,0)=0 and NVL(U.ACTL_SALES_TOT_LY,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(T.PLN_SLS_MNTH_STR_TOT,0)=0 then -100 when NVL(U.ACTL_SALES_TOT_LY,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND(((T.PLN_SLS_MNTH_STR_TOT / U.ACTL_SALES_TOT_LY)-1)*100,2) end as LY_PRCNT_TOT_SLS_MPS from (select g.loc_nm, ROUND(sum(g.PLN_SLS_MNTH_STR),0) as PLN_SLS_MNTH_STR_TOT from (select f.loc_nm,NVL(e.PLAN_SALES,0) as PLN_SLS_MNTH_STR from (select loc_nm from loc where loc_no='store') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select a.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,round(sum(a.mgr_wky_sls),0) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,wk b,loc lc where a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no='store' and a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id group by a.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id) c UNION select * from (select a.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id,Round(sum(gnrt_sls),0) as GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.fcst a,wk b,loc lc where a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no='store' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and a.fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc='Month' and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select loc_no,wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln where div_no='Division' and loc_no='store' and wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month')) and a.loc_no=lc.loc_no group by a.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id) d) e on f.loc_nm=e.loc_nm order by f.loc_nm) g group by g.loc_nm) T INNER JOIN (select J.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(J.ACTL_SLS_MPS),0) as ACTL_SALES_TOT_LY from (select T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPS from (select loc_nm from loc where loc_no='store') T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select S.loc_nm,S.perd_desc,S.wk_id,S.ACTL_SALES from (select lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id, ROUND(sum(a.actl_sls),0) as ACTL_SALES from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b,loc lc where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('LYMnth') and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and a.loc_no=lc.loc_no group by lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by b.wk_id) S) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.loc_nm) J group by J.loc_nm) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm

loc_no,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id) d) e on f.perd_desc=e.perd_desc and f.wk_id=e.wk_id order by f.wk_id) T INNER JOIN (select rownum x,f.perd_desc,f.wk_id,NVL(g.FCST_SALES_MPS,0) as FCST_SALES_MNTH_STR from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.loc_no,C.perd_desc,c.wk_id,ROUND(sum(FRCST_SLS),0) as FCST_SALES_MPS from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no, d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,ROUND(sum(FRCST_SLS),0) as FRCST_SLS, sum(FRCST_WAGE_AMT) as FCST_WAGE from WW_WLP.MNTH_FCST a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by c.loc_no,c.perd_desc,C.wk_id order by c.loc_no,c.wk_id) g on f.perd_desc=g.perd_desc and f.wk_id=g.wk_id order by f.wk_id) U on T.x=U.x order by T.wk_id
TCName.FCSTPercentageSalesTotal: select T.loc_nm, case when NVL(T.PLN_SLS_TOT_MPS,0)=0 and NVL(U.FCST_SLS_TOT_MPS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(T.PLN_SLS_TOT_MPS,0)=0 then -100 when NVL(U.FCST_SLS_TOT_MPS,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND(((T.PLN_SLS_TOT_MPS / U.FCST_SLS_TOT_MPS)-1)*100,2) end as FCST_PRCNT_TOT_SLS_MPS from (select g.loc_nm, ROUND(sum(g.PLN_SLS_MNTH_STR),0) as PLN_SLS_TOT_MPS from (select f.loc_nm,NVL(e.PLAN_SALES,0) as PLN_SLS_MNTH_STR from (select loc_nm from loc where loc_no='store') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select a.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,round(sum(a.mgr_wky_sls),0) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,wk b,loc lc where a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no='store' and a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id group by a.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id) c UNION select * from (select a.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id,Round(sum(gnrt_sls),0) as GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.fcst a,wk b,loc lc where a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no='store' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and a.fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc='Month' and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select loc_no,wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln where div_no='Division' and loc_no='store' and wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month')) and a.loc_no=lc.loc_no group by a.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id) d) e on f.loc_nm=e.loc_nm order by f.loc_nm) g group by g.loc_nm) T INNER JOIN (select C.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(FCST_SLS_MPS),0) as FCST_SLS_TOT_MPS from (select f.loc_nm,NVL(g.FCST_SALES_MPS,0) as FCST_SLS_MPS from (select loc_nm from loc where loc_no='store') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,C.perd_desc,c.wk_id,ROUND(sum(FCST_SALES),0) as FCST_SALES_MPS from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,ROUND(sum(frcst_sls),0) as FCST_SALES, sum(frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WAGE from WW_WLP.mnth_fcst a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no, b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,c.perd_desc, C.wk_id order by c.loc_no,c.wk_id) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm order by f.loc_nm) C group by c.loc_nm) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm

TCName.name: BudgetWages_CurrentMonth
TCName.BudgetWages: select f.wk_id,NVL(g.BDGT_WAGES_MNTH_STR,0) as BDGT_WAGE_MNTH_STR from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.loc_no,C.perd_desc,c.wk_id,ROUND(sum(BDGT_WAGE),0) as BDGT_WAGES_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,ROUND(sum(bdgt_sls),0) as BDGT_SALES, sum(bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no, b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by c.loc_no,c.perd_desc,C.wk_id order by c.loc_no,c.wk_id) g on f.perd_desc=g.perd_desc and f.wk_id=g.wk_id order by f.wk_id
TCName.BudgetWagesTotal: select C.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(BDGT_WAGE_MPS),0) as BDGT_WAGE_TOT_MPS from (select f.loc_nm,NVL(g.BDGT_WAGES_MNTH_STR,0) as BDGT_WAGE_MPS from (select loc_nm from loc where loc_no='store') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.loc_no,c.loc_nm,C.perd_desc,c.wk_id,ROUND(sum(BDGT_WAGE),0) as BDGT_WAGES_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,ROUND(sum(bdgt_sls),0) as BDGT_SALES, sum(bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm, d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,c.perd_desc, C.wk_id order by c.loc_no,c.wk_id) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm order by f.loc_nm) C group by c.loc_nm
TCName.ForecastWages: select c.wk_id,ROUND(sum(FCST_WAGE),0) as FCST_WAGE_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc, a.wk_id,sum(frcst_sls) as FCST_SALES, sum(frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WAGE from WW_WLP.mnth_fcst a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no, a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by c.loc_no,c.perd_desc,C.wk_id order by c.loc_no,c.wk_id
TCName.ForecastWagesTotal: select C.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(FCST_WAGE_MPS),0) as FCST_WAGE_TOT_MPS from (select f.loc_nm,NVL(g.FCST_WAGES_MNTH_STR,0) as FCST_WAGE_MPS from (select loc_nm from loc where loc_no='store') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.loc_no,c.loc_nm,C.perd_desc,c.wk_id,ROUND(sum(FCST_WAGE),0) as FCST_WAGES_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,ROUND(sum(frcst_sls),0) as FCST_SALES, sum(frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WAGE from WW_WLP.mnth_fcst a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,c.perd_desc,C.wk_id order by c.loc_no,c.wk_id) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm order by f.loc_nm) C group by c.loc_nm

TCName.name: BaseCostWages_CurrentMonth
TCName.BaseCostWages: select f.wk_id,NVL(e.BASE_COST_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as BASE_COST_MPS from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select d.wk_id,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)),0) as BASE_COST_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no='store' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d group by d.wk_id order by d.wk_id) e on e.wk_id=f.wk_id order by f.wk_id
TCName.BaseCostWagesTotal: select e.loc_nm,NVL(e.BASE_COST_TOT_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as BASE_COST_TOT_MPS from (select loc_nm from loc where loc_no='store') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select d.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)),0) as BASE_COST_TOT_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no='store' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d group by d.loc_nm,d.perd_desc) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm

TCName.name: PlannedWages_CurrentMonth
TCName.PlannedWages: select f.wk_id,NVL(e.PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_WAGE_MPS from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select d.wk_id,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_WGE) ,0) as PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no, c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no='store' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.wk_id order by d.wk_id) UNION select * from (select d.wk_id,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)),0) as BASE_COST_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no='store' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no='store' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.wk_id order by d.wk_id)) e on e.wk_id=f.wk_id order by f.wk_id
TCName.PlannedWagesTotal: select g.loc_nm,NVL(sum(g.PLN_WAGE_MPS),0) as PLN_WAGE_TOT_MPS from (select f.loc_nm,NVL(e.PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_WAGE_MPS from (select loc_nm from loc where loc_no='store') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select d.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,d.wk_id,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_WGE) ,0) as PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no='store' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.loc_nm,d.perd_desc, d.wk_id order by d.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,d.wk_id) UNION select * from (select d.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,d.wk_id,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)),0) as BASE_COST_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no, TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no='store' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no='store' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,d.wk_id order by d.loc_nm, d.perd_desc,d.wk_id)) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.loc_nm) g group by g.loc_nm

TCName.name: LYPercentageWages_CurrentMonth
TCName.LYPercentageWages: select T.wk_id, case when NVL(T.PLN_WAGE_MNTH_STR_CY,0)=0 and NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_LY,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(T.PLN_WAGE_MNTH_STR_CY,0)=0 then -100 when NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_LY,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND(((T.PLN_WAGE_MNTH_STR_CY / U.ACTL_WAGE_LY)-1)*100,2) end as LY_PRCNT_WAGE_MNTH_STR from (select x,f.wk_id,NVL(e.PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_WAGE_MNTH_STR_CY from (select rownum x,perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month') order by wk_id) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select d.wk_id,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_WGE) ,0) as PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no, c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no='store' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.wk_id order by d.wk_id) UNION select * from (select d.wk_id,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)),0) as BASE_COST_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no='store' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no='store' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.wk_id order by d.wk_id)) e on e.wk_id=f.wk_id order by f.wk_id) T INNER JOIN (select rownum x,T.perd_desc,T.wk_id,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_WAGE_LY from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('LYMnth') order by wk_id) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.wk_id,ROUND(sum(ACTL_WAGE),0) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no, a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('LYMnth')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.wk_id order by c.wk_id) U on T.wk_id=U.wk_id order by T.wk_id) U on T.x=U.x order by T.wk_id
TCName.LYPercentageWagesTotal: select T.loc_nm, case when NVL(T.PLN_WAGE_TOT_CY_MPS,0)=0 and NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_LY_MPS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(T.PLN_WAGE_TOT_CY_MPS,0)=0 then -100 when NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_LY_MPS,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND(((T.PLN_WAGE_TOT_CY_MPS / U.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_LY_MPS)-1)*100,2) end as LY_PRCNT_TOT_WAGE_MPS from (select g.loc_nm, NVL(sum(g.PLN_WAGE_MPS),0) as PLN_WAGE_TOT_CY_MPS from (select f.loc_nm,NVL(e.PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_WAGE_MPS from (select loc_nm from loc where loc_no='store') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select d.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,d.wk_id,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_WGE) ,0) as PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no='store' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,d.wk_id order by d.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,d.wk_id) UNION select * from (select d.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,d.wk_id, ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)),0) as BASE_COST_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm, b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no= 'store' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no='store' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.loc_nm,d.perd_desc, d.wk_id order by d.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,d.wk_id)) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.loc_nm) g group by g.loc_nm) T,(select T.loc_nm, NVL(ROUND(sum(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR),0),0) as ACTL_WAGE_TOT_LY_MPS from (select loc_nm from loc where loc_no='store') T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.loc_nm,c.wk_id,sum(ACTL_WAGE) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no, a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('LYMnth')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no, b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by c.loc_nm,C.wk_id order by c.loc_nm,c.wk_id) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm group by T.loc_nm) U where T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm

TCName.name: BudgetWagesPercentage_CurrentMonth
TCName.BudgetWagesPercentage: select h.wk_id, case when NVL(h.BDGT_WAGE_MNTH_STR,0)=0 and NVL(i.BDGT_SLS_MNTH_STR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(h.BDGT_WAGE_MNTH_STR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(i.BDGT_SLS_MNTH_STR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((h.BDGT_WAGE_MNTH_STR / i.BDGT_SLS_MNTH_STR)*100,2) end as BDGT_WAGE_PRCNT_MNTH_STR from (select f.perd_desc,f.wk_id, NVL(g.BDGT_WAGES_MNTH_STR,0) as BDGT_WAGE_MNTH_STR from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.loc_no,C.perd_desc,c.wk_id,ROUND(sum(BDGT_WAGE),0) as BDGT_WAGES_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no, d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,ROUND(sum(bdgt_sls),0) as BDGT_SALES, sum(bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no, d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by c.loc_no,c.perd_desc,C.wk_id order by c.loc_no,c.wk_id) g on f.perd_desc=g.perd_desc and f.wk_id=g.wk_id order by f.wk_id) h INNER JOIN (select f.perd_desc,f.wk_id,NVL(g.BDGT_SALES_MNTH_STR,0) as BDGT_SLS_MNTH_STR from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.loc_no,C.perd_desc,c.wk_id,ROUND(sum(BDGT_SALES),0) as BDGT_SALES_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,ROUND(sum(bdgt_sls),0) as BDGT_SALES, sum(bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by c.loc_no,c.perd_desc,C.wk_id order by c.loc_no,c.wk_id) g on f.perd_desc=g.perd_desc and f.wk_id=g.wk_id order by f.wk_id) i on h.perd_desc=i.perd_desc and h.wk_id=i.wk_id order by i.wk_id
TCName.BudgetWagesPercentageTotal: select h.loc_nm, case when NVL(h.BDGT_WAGE_TOT_MPS,0)=0 and NVL(i.BDGT_SLS_TOT_MPS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(h.BDGT_WAGE_TOT_MPS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(i.BDGT_SLS_TOT_MPS,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((h.BDGT_WAGE_TOT_MPS / i.BDGT_SLS_TOT_MPS)*100,2) end as BDGT_WAGE_PRCNT_TOT_MPS from (select C.loc_nm, ROUND(sum(BDGT_WAGE_MPS),0) as BDGT_WAGE_TOT_MPS from (select f.loc_nm,NVL(g.BDGT_WAGES_MNTH_STR,0) as BDGT_WAGE_MPS from (select loc_nm from loc where loc_no='store') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.loc_no,c.loc_nm,C.perd_desc,c.wk_id,ROUND(sum(BDGT_WAGE),0) as BDGT_WAGES_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,ROUND(sum(bdgt_sls),0) as BDGT_SALES, sum(bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm, d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,c.perd_desc,C.wk_id order by c.loc_no,c.wk_id) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm order by f.loc_nm) C group by c.loc_nm) h INNER JOIN (select C.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(BDGT_SLS_MPS),0) as BDGT_SLS_TOT_MPS from (select f.loc_nm,NVL(g.BDGT_SALES_MPS,0) as BDGT_SLS_MPS from (select loc_nm from loc where loc_no='store') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.loc_no,C.loc_nm,C.perd_desc,c.wk_id,ROUND(sum(BDGT_SALES),0) as BDGT_SALES_MPS from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no, b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,ROUND(sum(bdgt_sls),0) as BDGT_SALES, sum(bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no, a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,c.perd_desc,C.wk_id order by c.loc_no,c.wk_id) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm order by f.loc_nm) C group by c.loc_nm) i on h.loc_nm=i.loc_nm
TCName.ForecastWagesPercentage: select h.wk_id, case when NVL(h.FCST_WAGE_MNTH_STR,0)=0 and NVL(i.FCST_SLS_MNTH_STR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(h.FCST_WAGE_MNTH_STR,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(i.FCST_SLS_MNTH_STR,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((h.FCST_WAGE_MNTH_STR / i.FCST_SLS_MNTH_STR)*100,2) end as FCST_WAGE_PRCNT_MNTH_STR from (select f.perd_desc,f.wk_id,NVL(g. FCST_WAGES_MNTH_STR,0) as FCST_WAGE_MNTH_STR from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.loc_no,C.perd_desc,c.wk_id,ROUND(sum(FCST_WAGE),0) as FCST_WAGES_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc, a.wk_id,ROUND(sum(frcst_sls),0) as FCST_SALES, sum(frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WAGE from WW_WLP.mnth_fcst a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no, b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by c.loc_no,c.perd_desc,C.wk_id order by c.loc_no,c.wk_id) g on f.perd_desc=g.perd_desc and f.wk_id=g.wk_id order by f.wk_id) h INNER JOIN (select f.perd_desc,f.wk_id,NVL(g.FCST_SALES_MNTH_STR,0) as FCST_SLS_MNTH_STR from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.loc_no,C.perd_desc,c.wk_id,ROUND(sum(FCST_SALES) ,0) as FCST_SALES_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,ROUND(sum(frcst_sls),0) as FCST_SALES, sum(frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WAGE from WW_WLP.mnth_fcst a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by c.loc_no,c.perd_desc,C.wk_id order by c.loc_no,c.wk_id) g on f.perd_desc=g.perd_desc and f.wk_id=g.wk_id order by f.wk_id) i on h.perd_desc=i.perd_desc and h.wk_id=i.wk_id order by i.wk_id
TCName.ForecastWagesPercentageTotal: select h.loc_nm, case when NVL(h.FCST_WAGE_TOT_MPS,0)=0 and NVL(i.FCST_SLS_TOT_MPS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(h.FCST_WAGE_TOT_MPS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(i.FCST_SLS_TOT_MPS,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((h.FCST_WAGE_TOT_MPS / i.FCST_SLS_TOT_MPS)*100,2) end as FCST_WAGE_PRCNT_TOT_MPS from (select C.loc_nm, ROUND(sum(FCST_WAGE_MPS),0) as FCST_WAGE_TOT_MPS from (select f.loc_nm,NVL(g.FCST_WAGES_MNTH_STR,0) as FCST_WAGE_MPS from (select loc_nm from loc where loc_no='store') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.loc_no,c.loc_nm,C.perd_desc,c.wk_id,ROUND(sum(FCST_WAGE),0) as FCST_WAGES_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,ROUND(sum(frcst_sls),0) as FCST_SALES, sum(frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WAGE from WW_WLP.mnth_fcst a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,c.perd_desc,C.wk_id order by c.loc_no, c.wk_id) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm order by f.loc_nm) C group by c.loc_nm) h INNER JOIN (select C.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(FCST_SLS_MPS),0) as FCST_SLS_TOT_MPS from (select f.loc_nm,NVL(g.FCST_SALES_MPS,0) as FCST_SLS_MPS from (select loc_nm from loc where loc_no='store') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.loc_no,C.loc_nm, C.perd_desc,c.wk_id,ROUND(sum(FCST_SALES),0) as FCST_SALES_MPS from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id, ROUND(sum(frcst_sls),0) as FCST_SALES, sum(frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WAGE from WW_WLP.mnth_fcst a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.div_no, b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,c.perd_desc,C.wk_id order by c.loc_no,c.wk_id) g on f.loc_nm=g.loc_nm order by f.loc_nm) C group by c.loc_nm) i on h.loc_nm=i.loc_nm

TCName.name: PlannedWagesPercentage_CurrentMonth
TCName.PlannedWagesPercentage: select j.wk_id, case when NVL(j.PLN_WAGE_MPS,0)=0 and NVL(n.PLN_SLS_MPS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(j.PLN_WAGE_MPS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(n.PLN_SLS_MPS,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((j.PLN_WAGE_MPS / n.PLN_SLS_MPS)*100,2) end as PLN_WAGE_PRCNT_MPS from (select f.wk_id,NVL(e.PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_WAGE_MPS from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select d.wk_id,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_WGE) ,0) as PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no='store' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.wk_id order by d.wk_id) UNION select * from (select d.wk_id,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)),0) as BASE_COST_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no, a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no='store' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no='store' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.wk_id order by d.wk_id)) e on e.wk_id=f.wk_id order by f.wk_id) j INNER JOIN (select f.perd_desc,f.wk_id,NVL(e.PLAN_SALES,0) as PLN_SLS_MPS from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select a.loc_no,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,round(sum(a.mgr_wky_sls),0) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,wk b where a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no='store' and a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') and a.wk_id= b.wk_id group by a.loc_no,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.loc_no,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id) c UNION select * from (select loc_no,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id,Round(sum(gnrt_sls),0) as GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.fcst a,wk b where div_no='Division' and loc_no='store' and dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc= 'Month' and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select loc_no,wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln where div_no='Division' and loc_no='store' and wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month')) group by loc_no,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by loc_no,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id) d) e on f.perd_desc=e.perd_desc and f.wk_id=e.wk_id order by f.wk_id) n on j.wk_id=n.wk_id order by j.wk_id
TCName.PlannedWagesPercentageTotal: select j.loc_nm, case when NVL(j.PLN_WAGE_TOT_MPS,0)=0 and NVL(n.PLN_SLS_TOT_MPS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(j.PLN_WAGE_TOT_MPS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(n.PLN_SLS_TOT_MPS,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((j.PLN_WAGE_TOT_MPS / n.PLN_SLS_TOT_MPS)*100,2) end as PLN_WAGE_PRCNT_TOT_MPS from (select g.loc_nm,NVL(sum(g.PLN_WAGE_MPS),0) as PLN_WAGE_TOT_MPS from (select f.loc_nm,NVL(e.PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_WAGE_MPS from (select loc_nm from loc where loc_no='store') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select d.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,d.wk_id,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_WGE) ,0) as PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no='store' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,d.wk_id order by d.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,d.wk_id) UNION select * from (select d.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,d.wk_id,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)),0) as BASE_COST_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no='store' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no='store' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,d.wk_id order by d.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,d.wk_id)) e on e.loc_nm=f.loc_nm order by f.loc_nm) g group by g.loc_nm) j INNER JOIN (select g.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(g.PLN_SLS_MNTH_STR),0) as PLN_SLS_TOT_MPS from (select f.loc_nm,NVL(e.PLAN_SALES,0) as PLN_SLS_MNTH_STR from (select loc_nm from loc where loc_no='store') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select a.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,round(sum(a.mgr_wky_sls),0) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,wk b,loc lc where a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no='store' and a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id group by a.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id) c UNION select * from (select a.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id,Round(sum(gnrt_sls),0) as GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.fcst a,wk b,loc lc where a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no='store' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and a.fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc='Month' and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select loc_no,wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln where div_no='Division' and loc_no='store' and wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month')) and a.loc_no=lc.loc_no group by a.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by a.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id) d) e on f.loc_nm=e.loc_nm order by f.loc_nm) g group by g.loc_nm) n on j.loc_nm=n.loc_nm

TCName.name: LYWagesPercentage_CurrentMonth
TCName.LYWagesPercentage: select x.wk_id, case when NVL(x.ACTL_WAGE_LY_MPS,0)=0 and NVL(y.ACTL_SLS_LY_MPS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(x.ACTL_WAGE_LY_MPS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(y.ACTL_SLS_LY_MPS,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((x.ACTL_WAGE_LY_MPS / y.ACTL_SLS_LY_MPS)*100,2) end as LY_WAGE_PRCNT_MPS from (select T.wk_id,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_WAGE_LY_MPS from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('LYMnth') order by wk_id) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.wk_id,ROUND(sum(ACTL_WAGE),0) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a. loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('LYMnth')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d. perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.wk_id order by c.wk_id) U on T.wk_id=U.wk_id order by T.wk_id) x,(select T.wk_id,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_LY_MPS from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='LYMnth' order by wk_id) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select S.perd_desc,S.wk_id,S.ACTL_SALES from (select b.perd_desc,b.wk_id, ROUND(sum(a.actl_sls),0) as ACTL_SALES from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('LYMnth') and loc_no in ('store') and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by b.wk_id) S) U on T.wk_id=U.wk_id order by T.wk_id) y where x.wk_id=y.wk_id order by x.wk_id
TCName.LYWagesPercentageTotal: select x.loc_nm, case when NVL(x.ACTL_WAGE_LY_TOT_MPS,0)=0 and NVL(y.ACTL_SLS_LY_TOT_MPS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(x.ACTL_WAGE_LY_TOT_MPS,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(y.ACTL_SLS_LY_TOT_MPS,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((x.ACTL_WAGE_LY_TOT_MPS / y.ACTL_SLS_LY_TOT_MPS)*100,2) end as LY_WAGE_PRCNT_TOT_MPS from (select T.loc_nm, ROUND(NVL(sum(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR),0),0) as ACTL_WAGE_LY_TOT_MPS from (select loc_nm from loc where loc_no='store') T INNER JOIN (select c.loc_nm,c.wk_id,sum(ACTL_WAGE) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no, a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('LYMnth')) and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no, b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by c.loc_nm,C.wk_id order by c.loc_nm,c.wk_id) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm group by T.loc_nm) x, (select J.loc_nm,ROUND(sum(J.ACTL_SLS_MPS),0) as ACTL_SLS_LY_TOT_MPS from (select T.loc_nm,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPS from (select loc_nm from loc where loc_no='store') T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select S.loc_nm,S.perd_desc,S.wk_id,S.ACTL_SALES from (select lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, b.wk_id, ROUND(sum(a.actl_sls),0) as ACTL_SALES from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b,loc lc where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('LYMnth') and a.loc_no in ('store') and a.div_no = 'Division' and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and a.loc_no=lc.loc_no group by lc.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by b.wk_id) S) U on T.loc_nm=U.loc_nm order by T.loc_nm) J group by J.loc_nm) y where x.loc_nm=y.loc_nm

TCName.name: SMSHours_CurrentMonth
TCName.SMSHours: select x.wk_id,NVL(ROUND(((ROUND(((y.SMS_HOURS_MPS*100)/25),0)*25)/100),2),0) as SMS_HRS_MPS from (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') x LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.wk_id,(sum(C.FIX_HRS_DEPT_TOT) + sum(C.VOL_HRS_DEPT_TOT)) as SMS_HOURS_MPS from (select A.loc_no,A.loc_nm,A.wk_id,A.dept_no,sum(fix_hrs) as FIX_HRS_DEPT_TOT,Sum(vol_hrs) as VOL_HRS_DEPT_TOT from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,B.PERD_DESC,a.wk_id,d.dept_no, a.task_no,nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,NVL(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_lbr_std a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c, ww_wlp.task d where a.task_no=d.task_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and d.dept_no!=20 and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and c.div_no='Division' and c.loc_no='store') A group by A.loc_no,A.loc_nm,A.wk_id,A.dept_no order by A.loc_no,A.wk_id,A.dept_no) C group by C.wk_id order by c.wk_id) y on x.wk_id=y.wk_id order by x.wk_id
TCName.SMSHoursTotal: select z.loc_nm,NVL(ROUND(((ROUND(((sum(Z.SMS_HRS_MPS)*100)/25),0)*25)/100),2),0) as SMS_HRS_TOT_MPS from (select x.loc_nm,NVL(y.SMS_HOURS_MPS,0) as SMS_HRS_MPS from (select loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc where loc_no='store') x LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.loc_nm,C.perd_desc,C.wk_id,(sum(C.FIX_HRS_DEPT_TOT) + sum(C.VOL_HRS_DEPT_TOT)) as SMS_HOURS_MPS from (select A.loc_no,A.loc_nm,A.perd_desc,A.wk_id,A.dept_no,sum(fix_hrs) as FIX_HRS_DEPT_TOT,Sum(vol_hrs) as VOL_HRS_DEPT_TOT from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,B.PERD_DESC,a.wk_id,d.dept_no,a.task_no,nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs, NVL(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_lbr_std a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c, ww_wlp.task d where a.task_no=d.task_no and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and d.dept_no!=20 and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and c.div_no='Division' and c.loc_no='store') A group by A.loc_no,A.loc_nm,A.perd_desc,A.wk_id, A.dept_no order by A.loc_no,A.wk_id,A.dept_no) C group by C.loc_nm,C.perd_desc,C.wk_id order by C.loc_nm,C.perd_desc,c.wk_id) y on x.loc_nm=y.loc_nm order by x.loc_nm) z group by z.loc_nm

TCName.name: BaseHours_CurrentMonth
